TEXT.TITLE: SPECTRAMED INITIAL OFFERING UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: Spectramed Inc said an initial public offering of 3,640,000 common shares is underway at 11 dlrs a share through underwriters led by Alex. Brown and Sons Inc <ABSB.O> and PaineWebber Group inc <PWJ>. Reuter
